name: bedel-api
description: The bedel api, for the client-side, bedel apps and the server side.

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover -x app/util/logger.js ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Gum-Joe
